name: Loans; service and custody
text: The corporation may contract for the service and custody of its loans.  The contract may provide for the payment of fees or charges for the services rendered; provided that the fees or charges shall not exceed the usual, customary, and reasonable charges for the services rendered. [L 1983, c 270, pt of §1; am L 1987, c 337, §16; am L 1988, c 104, §2]
